text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, sumoro ci sudaast, ki cun ʙa sumo gufta mesavad: «Dar rohi Alloh taolo rahsipor [cihod] saved», susti ʙa xarc medihed [va dar xonahojaton menisined]? Ojo ʙa coji oxirat ʙa zindagii dunjo dilxus kardaed? [Pas, ʙidoned, ki] koloi zindagii dunjo dar ʙaroʙari oxirat cuz andake nest
